alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midway to Woodville. Movement was east at 25 mph. At 710 PM EDT the NWS Tallahassee office measured a wind gust of 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Newport, Shadeville, Hells Half Acre, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Bethel and Tallahassee Regional A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
